How to install _Spring Roo_ http-representations addon.
 # Download the addon: [http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.httprepresentations.roo.addon-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar]
 # Open the roo shell
{{{
  roo>felix shell start file:/<absolute path to the addon directory>/net.tzolov.httprepresentations.roo.addon-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar
}}}
 # To verify the installation type:
{{{
  roo>osgi ps 
}}}
 Amongst other addons you should see:
{{{
[  61] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.httprepresentations.roo.addon (1.1.0.SNAPSHOT)
}}}
